segments.text: It's heartbreaking to see the sink overflowing like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's unaware, just focused on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's ruining the floor and cabinets slowly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot in the puddle makes me worry for her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are risking so much for some cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's balance on that stool looks dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, it could really hurt him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's expectant face tugs at my heart.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're probably just hungry and seeking comfort.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden outside contrasts this indoor sadness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad that no one's noticing the problems.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All these little hazards could lead to bigger troubles.
segments.speaker: PAR
